00018 #include "cmodulechooserbutton.h"
00019 #include "resource.h"
00020 #include "backend/cswordbackend.h"
00021 
00022 //Qt includes
00023 #include <qstring.h>
00024 #include <qtooltip.h>
00025 
00026 //KDE includes
00027 #include <kpopupmenu.h>
00028 #include <klocale.h>
00029 
00030 CModuleChooserButton::CModuleChooserButton(CSwordModuleInfo* useModule,CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleType type, const int id, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00031     : KToolBarButton("", id, parent,name) {
00032     qDebug("CModuleChooserButton::CModuleCHooserButton");
00033 
00034     m_id = id;
00035     m_moduleType = type;    
00036     m_module = useModule;
00037     if (!m_module)
00038     m_hasModule = false;
00039   else
00040     m_hasModule = true;
00041     
00042     setIcon( iconName() );
00043     setPopupDelay(0);
00044     
00045     //create popup
00046     m_popup = new KPopupMenu(this); 
00047     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Select additional modules"));    
00048     m_popup->setCheckable(true);
00049     m_popup->insertItem(i18n("NONE"));
00050     m_popup->insertSeparator(); 
00051     connect(m_popup, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(moduleChosen(int)));        
00052     setPopup(m_popup);
00053     
00054     ListCSwordModuleInfo& modules = backend()->moduleList();
00055     for (modules.first(); modules.current(); modules.next()) {
00056         if (modules.current()->type() == m_moduleType) {
00057             m_popup->insertItem( modules.current()->name() );
00058         }
00059     }   
00060     //Check the appropriate entry
00061     if (m_module) {
00062         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00063             if (m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) == m_module->name()) {
00064                 m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),true);
00065             QToolTip::add(this, m_module->name() );             
00066             break;
00067             }
00068         }
00069     }
00070     else {
00071         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00072             if (m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) == i18n("NONE") )
00073                 m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),true);
00074                 break;
00075         }
00076     }
00077 }   
00078 
00080 const QString CModuleChooserButton::iconName(){
00081     switch (m_moduleType) {
00082         case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00083             if (m_hasModule)
00084                 return QString::fromLatin1(BIBLE_ICON_MC);
00085             else
00086                 return QString::fromLatin1(BIBLE_ADD_ICON_MC);
00087         case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00088             if (m_hasModule)
00089                 return QString::fromLatin1(COMMENTARY_ICON_MC);
00090             else
00091                 return QString::fromLatin1(COMMENTARY_ICON_MC);
00092         case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00093             if (m_hasModule)
00094                 return QString::fromLatin1(LEXICON_ICON_MC);
00095             else
00096                 return QString::fromLatin1(LEXICON_ADD_ICON_MC);
00097         case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00098             if (m_hasModule)
00099                 return QString::fromLatin1(BOOK_ICON_MC);
00100             else
00101                 return QString::fromLatin1(BOOK_ADD_ICON_MC);
00102         default:
00103             return QString::fromLatin1(BIBLE_ICON_MC);
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 CSwordModuleInfo* CModuleChooserButton::module() {      
00108     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++) {
00109         if ( m_popup->isItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i)) )
00110             return backend()->findModuleByName( m_popup->text(m_popup->idAt(i)) );
00111     }   
00112     return 0; //"none" selected
00113 }
00114 
00116 int CModuleChooserButton::getId() const{
00117     return m_id;
00118 }
00119 
00121 void CModuleChooserButton::moduleChosen( int ID ){  
00122     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_popup->count(); i++)
00123         m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->idAt(i),false);        
00124     m_popup->setItemChecked(ID, true);
00125     
00126     if (m_popup->text(ID) == i18n("NONE")) {
00127         if (m_hasModule) {
00128         emit sigRemoveButton(m_id);
00129         return;
00130         }
00131     }
00132     else {
00133       if (!m_hasModule)
00134         emit sigAddButton();
00135         m_hasModule = true;     
00136         m_module = module();
00137         setIcon(iconName());
00138 //      repaint();          
00139     emit sigChanged();
00140     
00141     QToolTip::remove(this);
00142     if (module())
00143         QToolTip::add(this, module()->name());
00144     }
00145 }
